summary: "Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone" is a fantasy book by J.K. Rowling about a young wizard, Harry Potter, who learns about his magical abilities on his 11th birthday. He attends Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, makes friends, and discovers that a dark wizard, Lord Voldemort, killed his parents but failed to kill him. With help from his friends Ron and Hermione, Harry stops Voldemort from returning. First published in 1997, the book became a global hit, selling over 120 million copies and inspiring movies and translations into many languages.
title: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
